DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , interventional , observational , unblinded , single-arm , multicenter registry young old subject drug refractory , recurrent , symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation .
DOC.brief_title: NAVISTAR速 THERMOCOOL速 SF Catheter : Observational Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study measure `` real-world '' acute procedural outcome ( procedural efficiency , acute safety , effectiveness one year ) associate use NAVISTAR速 THERMOCOOL速 SF Catheter clinical setting subject drug refractory , recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation .
DOC.criteria: Drug refractory , recurrent , symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation Age 18 year old Patients must able willing provide write informed consent participate study Atrial fibrillation secondary electrolyte imbalance , thyroid disease , reversible noncardiac cause Previous ablation atrial fibrillation Episodes atrial fibrillation last longer 30 day terminate via cardioversion Uncontrolled heart failure , NYHA Class III IV heart failure Documented intraatrial thrombus abnormality preablation echocardiogram Contraindication anticoagulation Stroke , cardiac surgery , unstable angina , myocardial infarction percutaneous coronary intervention within past 3 month Awaiting cardiac transplantation Heart disease corrective surgery anticipate within 6 month Enrollment investigational drug , biologic device study Subjects unwilling comply protocol followup requirement Patients pregnant
